item.description:
**UPDATE**  Let's meet up at 6:30 to get tix and gather together.  The Brattle has a tiny lobby so it should be easy to find each other.  If in doubt, I'll be wearing a red wool cloak.

"Hello. My name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father. Prepare to die. "

This year marks the 25th anniversary of the cult classic "The Princess Bride." The Brattle Theatre is showing the film the weekend before Valentine's--perfect timing for both couples in "twu wuv" and single curmudgeons! Let's plan to have dinner after the movie. http://brattlefilm.org/2012/02/11/the-princ...
item.name: "The Princess Bride"
